EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Beyond the 12-factor App <[[http://pivotal.io/beyond-the-twelve-factor-app]]> eBook authored by Kevin Hoffman, Advisory Solutions Architect at Pivotal.
This eBook takes you through each factor in detail, explaining why these guidelines are important and, in some cases, pointing out how and why today’s new approaches work better. You’ll learn exactly what a 12-factor app is, and discover how to evaluate your existing applications against the guidelines in this book.
Thank you again and please keep up on the latest Pivotal developments and customer success stories by checking out our blogs <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/]]> and podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal]]>, and following us on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/pivotalcf/]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C. Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
